org.tests.data

Class VariablesFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tests.data.VariablesFactory

  • public class VariablesFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for making and configuring the decision variables that are added to the model of the constraint solver.

    Currently the constraint solver being used in Exquisite is Choco. Due to various other limitations, only Integer variables are supported in Exquisite at the moment.

    Author:
    David
    See Also:
    DiagnosisModelLoader

      • VariablesFactory

        public VariablesFactory(java.util.Dictionary<java.lang.String,choco.kernel.model.variables.integer.IntegerExpressionVariable> variablesMap)
        The constructor takes a Dictionary that maps a cell reference to the corresponding integer variable.

        In production you would normally pass in an empty (new) Dictionary. However you could also test various aspects of the class with a pre-populated Dictionary.

        variablesMap -

      • variableAlreadyExists

        public boolean variableAlreadyExists(java.lang.String variableName)
        Checks if a decision variable of a given name has already been constructed. This situation arises if any variables have been defined with a global value bound. Which results in them being created first. This test is used to avoid creating duplicate variables.
        Returns:
        true if decision variable already exists.

      • makeIntegerVariable

        public choco.kernel.model.variables.integer.IntegerVariable makeIntegerVariable(java.lang.String variableName,
                                                                       int min,
                                                                       int max)
        Make a Choco integer variable to be added to the solver model.
        Parameters:
        variableName - - name to be given to model variable.
        min - - minimum integer value the variable will store.
        max - - maximum integer value the variable will store.
        Returns:
        Choco IntegerVariable
